ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] WANT EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Dial-up? Fast? ROTF LOL My dial-up sucks, i have a timed account, which you may or maynot have. It works on dialup, but my boyfriend got cable modem to play
ygData.messageBody:
Dial-up? Fast? ROTF LOL
My dial-up sucks, i have a timed account, which you may or maynot have.
It works on dialup, but my boyfriend got cable modem to play recently and he LOVES it even more now, I am still stuck with dialup and see the different in speed and most defidently graphics.
BADBRAD112 <badbrad112@...> wrote:Hi everyone, i just wanted to ask some questions. Does this game work well at all using dail up, cause thats all i got right now and i was wonering if i am gonna need to upgrade to cable internet to play this game, if any of you out there use dail up, does it run fast or what?

thanks
